title: Reveal Field
description: Help field technicians manage their jobs and stay connected with the office. Reveal Field (formerly known as Field Service Dispatch for Reveal) makes it easy for dispatchers to efficiently schedule and communicate about jobs with technicians and customers. With the Reveal Field mobile app, technicians can easily share job progress and important job details with the office, helping to simplify communication and increase productivity in the field. Technicians can also capture proof of service details, such as job notes, photos and signatures.
